speech_enhancement.name: speech_enhancement
speech_enhancement.description: Enhances speech audio by applying gain/volume adjustment

parameters.gain_db: float - Gain in decibels to boost or reduce volume (positive for louder, negative for quieter)

voice_conversion.name: voice_conversion
voice_conversion.description: Changes the pitch of voice/audio by shifting semitones

parameters.semitones: float - Number of semitones to shift pitch (positive for higher, negative for lower)

highpass_filter.name: highpass_filter
highpass_filter.description: Removes low-frequency noise and rumble using a high-pass filter

parameters.cutoff_frequency_hz: float - Cutoff frequency in Hz, frequencies below this are attenuated (default: 50.0)

lowpass_filter.name: lowpass_filter
lowpass_filter.description: Removes high-frequency noise and harshness using a low-pass filter

parameters.cutoff_frequency_hz: float - Cutoff frequency in Hz, frequencies above this are attenuated (default: 8000.0)

noise_gate.name: noise_gate
noise_gate.description: Reduces background noise and unwanted sounds using a noise gate

parameters.threshold_db: float - Gate threshold in dB, sounds below this are reduced (default: -40.0)
parameters.ratio: float - Reduction ratio, higher values create more aggressive gating (default: 2.0)

compressor.name: compressor
compressor.description: Applies dynamic range compression to even out audio levels

parameters.ratio: float - Compression ratio, higher values create more compression (default: 3.0)

peak_filter.name: peak_filter
peak_filter.description: Boosts or cuts specific frequencies using a peak/notch filter

parameters.gain_db: float - Gain in dB, positive values boost, negative values cut (default: 0.0)
parameters.q: float - Filter Q factor, higher values affect narrower frequency range (default: 1.0)

high_shelf.name: high_shelf
high_shelf.description: Boosts or cuts high frequencies using a high-shelf filter

parameters.cutoff_hz: float - Shelf frequency in Hz, frequencies above this are affected (default: 8000.0)
parameters.gain_db: float - Gain in dB, positive boosts highs, negative cuts highs (default: 0.0)

low_shelf.name: low_shelf
low_shelf.description: Boosts or cuts low frequencies using a low-shelf filter

parameters.cutoff_hz: float - Shelf frequency in Hz, frequencies below this are affected (default: 200.0)
parameters.gain_db: float - Gain in dB, positive boosts bass, negative cuts bass (default: 0.0)

ladder_filter.name: ladder_filter
ladder_filter.description: Applies Moog-style ladder filter for vintage synthesizer-like filtering

parameters.cutoff_hz: float - Filter cutoff frequency in Hz (default: 1000.0)
parameters.resonance: float - Filter resonance from 0.0 to 1.0, higher values are more resonant (default: 0.2)
parameters.drive_db: float - Input drive in dB, adds harmonic distortion (default: 0.0)

reverb.name: reverb
reverb.description: Adds professional reverb effect to create spatial depth and ambience

parameters.room_size: float - Room size from 0.0 to 1.0, larger values create bigger spaces (default: 0.25)
parameters.damping: float - High frequency damping from 0.0 to 1.0, higher values are more damped (default: 0.5)
parameters.wet_level: float - Wet signal level from 0.0 to 1.0 (default: 0.15)
parameters.dry_level: float - Dry signal level from 0.0 to 1.0 (default: 0.85)

examples: Make it sound like a big room

delay.name: delay
delay.description: Adds delay effect for echo and rhythmic repeats

parameters.feedback: float - Feedback amount from 0.0 to 1.0, higher values create more repeats (default: 0.25)

chorus.name: chorus
chorus.description: Adds chorus effect for thicker, richer sound with subtle pitch modulation

parameters.rate_hz: float - Modulation rate in Hz, speed of the effect (default: 1.0)
parameters.depth: float - Modulation depth from 0.0 to 1.0, higher values are more pronounced (default: 0.25)

phaser.name: phaser
phaser.description: Adds phaser effect for sweeping, swooshing sounds

parameters.rate_hz: float - Modulation rate in Hz, speed of the sweep (default: 0.5)
parameters.depth: float - Modulation depth from 0.0 to 1.0, higher values are more dramatic (default: 0.5)

limiter.name: limiter
limiter.description: Applies limiting to prevent digital clipping and control peak levels

parameters.threshold_db: float - Limiting threshold in dB, peaks above this are limited (default: -1.0)

gain.name: gain
gain.description: Adjusts overall level by applying gain in decibels

invert.name: invert
invert.description: Flips the polarity (phase) of the audio signal

mp3_compressor.name: mp3_compressor
mp3_compressor.description: Applies MP3-style compression artifacts using LAME (VBR)

gsm_compressor.name: gsm_compressor
gsm_compressor.description: Applies GSM Full Rate compression to emulate 2G phone sound

add_latency.name: add_latency
add_latency.description: Adds delay by inserting the specified number of silent samples

parameters.samples: int - Number of samples to delay (default 44100)

distortion.name: distortion
distortion.description: Adds harmonic distortion using tanh waveshaping

clipping.name: clipping
clipping.description: Applies hard clipping at a fixed threshold

parameters.threshold_db: float - Threshold in dB to clip at (default -6.0)

bitcrush.name: bitcrush
bitcrush.description: Reduces bit depth for lo-fi digital sound

speech_recognition.name: speech_recognition
speech_recognition.description: Transcribes audio to text using automatic speech recognition (ASR) with SpeechBrain
examples: What is being said in this audio?

speechbrain_enhancement.name: speechbrain_enhancement
speechbrain_enhancement.description: Enhances speech quality using advanced neural networks (MetricGAN+) to reduce noise and improve clarity
examples: Use AI to enhance audio quality

text_to_speech.name: text_to_speech
text_to_speech.description: Converts text to natural-sounding speech using neural text-to-speech synthesis (Tacotron2 + HiFiGAN). No input audio file required - generates audio from text.

parameters.text: string - The text to convert to speech (extracted from quotes in user request)

examples: Convert "Welcome to our service" to speech
Generate speech for "Thank you for using our system"
Create voice saying "Please hold while we connect you"
Make audio of "This is a test message"

list_capabilities.name: list_capabilities
list_capabilities.description: Lists all available tools this agent can use with their parameters.
examples: What are you able to do?
